column1: 4115,Indigenous Health Workers,,"Collaborate with other professionals to assess client needs or plan treatments
column3: Counsel clients or patients with substance abuse issues
column5: Act as an advocate or communicator regarding the cultural, diversity or accessibility needs of others
column7: Support individuals with diverse needs to understand, access and utilise information or services
column9: Develop treatment plans for patients or clients
column11: Intervene in crisis situations to assist clients
column13: Deliver culturally appropriate programs, policies or services
column15: Modify treatment plans to accommodate client needs
column17: Develop programs, policies or services that are culturally appropriate
column19: Counsel family members of clients or patients
column21: Complete documentation required by programs or regulations
column23: Refer clients to community or social service programs
column25: Refer individuals to educational or work programs
column27: Maintain a working understanding of the cultural, diversity and accessibility needs of others, and how this applies to the role
column29: Monitor clients to evaluate treatment progress
column33: Supervise workers providing client or patient services
column35: Plan programs to address community health issues
column37: Evaluate potential problems in home or work environments of clients
column39: Interview clients to gather information about their backgrounds, needs or progress
column47: Advise others on social or educational issues",0.08562952212370077
